dc:title: Poverty is the Face of Christ
dc:creator: Dorothy Day

dc:description.p: Describes the struggle in establishing farming communes as Peter Maurin taught. Poverty, toil, and suffering are bore by the young families trying to live on the land. She writes to comfort these fellow workers who live day by day.
